title: Videos from my cable/inernet provider Xfinity stopped playing last 2 weeks - Amazon Prime too
content:
Fix video and audio playback problems on Firefox for Windows 10

Last 2 weeks my xfinity movies, and possible Amazon Prime videos too, stopped playing/won't load in latest FF on Win10. Viewing most videos on YouTube OK, some commercial films posted available for free show "can't play" message with "diagnose" link, returning FireFox page saying "your browser is up to date" WTF?

Firefox displays message in browser frame at top of content area - "you may need to improve video playback by installing Microsoft Feature Pack click here" That MS link goes to FireFox page with UNHELPFUL info. - only Win10 link/info relates to some "N" version of Windows - nothing to do with my version.

So, is the issue a screwed up Win10 update - the one that makes Start Menu and toolbar items inaccessible to mouse? - or other "update" like the mouse-pointer?

Mozilla support shows no immediately relevant info/help 11-3-2021
creator: gregrice

title: Firefox Snap won't Launch under Ubuntu 21.10
content:
I upgraded my system from Ubuntu 21.04 to 21.10. I previouslly had Firefox installed from a .deb After the upgrade to 21.10 when I tried to launch Firefox I get the following error;

> Gtk-Message: 15:57:41.476: Failed to load module “canberra-gtk-module” [GFX1-]: glxtest: libEGL missing

I’ve removed and reinstalled the new Firefox snap. I get the same error when I launch it from the terminal.

When I launch from the graphical interface; toolbar> Applications> Internet> Firefox I get a different error;

> Firefox is already running, but is not responding. To use Firefox, you must first close the existing Firefox process, restart your device, or use a different profile.

This happens even following a full shutdown and restart.

title: Firefox continues to stretch like it's going into fullscreen, going back, and then freezing entirely
content:
I don't know quite how to explain the problem I keep having. After upgrading to 91.0 ESR, the problem I had with regular Firefox has happened once again. The problem I keep having is that the browser will stretch like it's going into Full Screen for a second, snap back, and then stretch up again before freezing and crashing entirely, that is, if it doesn't hold on the fake fullscreen and turn off my monitor, making me have to restart my PC entirely.

I also notice that this newest version freezes more than usual overall.

Can someone explain what the problem is and how to fix it, or if Mozilla's going to fix it in the next update?

Thank you!

title: Redirecting to Wrong Page
content:
Hi, I just downloaded Firefox to my Mac. Everything is updated. The browser works like this:

I type in a URL.

First, a full-screen pop-up window that asks me to install an Add-on. (I read the Info - looks like an advertisement? - What is this? - Is this Normal? -Is this going to happen all the time?

Next, a series of "redirect" URLs flash across the search line...

Next, I end up at some completely random site.

So, my basic question as a new-to-Firefox user is, as politely as possible, WTF???

My first experience of Firefox...Do I feel safe? NO. I looked at the Help/FAQ section and, apparently Firefox Support hasn't encountered this issue?

I've been forced to jump into forum discussions to make it work. SUCKS. So, is it malware that was downloaded with Firefox? I don't know. Should I toggle something in about:config to "true" or to "false"? I don't know.

If this "redirect" feature is just part of Firefox, PLEASE just tell me. I'll use a different browser.

title: update
content:
Illegible shrinking text. Why is my "unique" text so faint, that it is hard to read, but the border of the box, the question "How can we help?" is dark black, so very legible.

The not so subtle message is: we hate our users and their ideas, we want them to squint and struggle to use our programs, not we want yo to see the headings clearly, we warn you about up-dates and give you choices. Empty explanations, like a modern, up-to-date format, are just that empty. Nerds ≠ users. Both have value. WTF!!

title: Change of default search engine not possible
content:
I am experiencing the same problem as multiple other Firefox users. Here are examples:

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1346958

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1203608

I too set the default search engine to Google, but it keeps reverting to Bing. Living in a free society, I would like to retain my right of choice to search using the search engine I want to use, not have this choice made for me.

I attach two screenshots marked with a red square showing that all I see when trying to change the default search engine is the Firefox logo and the words "a browser". No other search engines are available, neither Bing, nor Google nor any other.

I have tried the solutions suggested, but they are not appropriate in my case.

If this is due to a bug, or a wilful decision to the advantage of Microsoft, I urge you to squash the bug causing this or end the commercial arrangement with Microsoft.

title: Google Images reverse search via drag and drop does not work
content:
Hi. I use Google reverse image search pretty often. When I have to apply search to image saved to my local storage, I go to images.google.com, drag image file from my Windows 10 desktop and drop it onto the Google search field. Unfortunately, it stopped working reliably few months ago. Sometimes it works, but most of times not.

I'm sure it is a Firefox bug since I tried to disable all of my extensions, delete cookies and even made clean Firefox installation in Windows Sandbox. Results were always the same. In Microsoft Edge, everything works fine.

Could somebody fix that please? After YouTube's inability to remember my theme selection (I was used to bright theme, but I had to stick with default dark one), this is another annoying issue I have on Google sites.

Thanks.

title: Upgrade to FF94 has made the homepage shortcuts too small.
content:
Upgrade to FF94 has horribly messed up my much loved FF homepage.

The pinned shortcuts are now too small and too far apart. Their images - those that weren't lost in the upgrade - have been shrunk to half their previous size. Why? How is this an improvement?

This problem had arisen in an earlier release but the fix I had found for it (https://www.reddit.com/r/firefox/comments/nrln39/homepage_pinned_sites_too_small_and_widely_spread/) isn't working any more.

Please can you suggest how I may restore my much missed homepage?

Thanks in anticipation, Peter

This report also contains technical information about the state of the application when it crashed.
creator: Jhcbiinoc

title: add-ons
content: I have had Metamask installed for a long time but recently it has vanished from my browser and despite enabling it many times, deleting and reinstalling and turning it on, it still is not showing up in Firefox. I tried connecting Uniswap to it and it sends me to the download metamask page even though I have already downloaded and installed. What is going on?
creator: nicobowen

title: Switching off searching in the address bar
content: I see that others have also asked this question. I've done the about:config, keyw and changed it to false but when I try and search in google (in the middle of the page) it still defers to the address bar. Why does firefox do this and why does it have to be such a drama to change it? A simple answer please, I don't want to do anything more than have my preference to search in the google box in the middle of the page. Thanks
creator: startmeup1150

title: version 94
content: Automatically upgraded to version 94 on 11/2/2021. OS is Windows 10. Now Dark mode no longer functions even when enabled in extensions and themes. Any solution available?
creator: jcamero4

title: Opening home page has been replaced.
content: My opening home page has been my Outlook Mail page. It has now been replaced by a Firefox opening page with a pinkish background hue that shows icons for a bunch of different web sites - including one for Outlook Mail (which will open Outlook Mail, but I don't want the inconvenience of having to access it this way), plus it also shows a bunch of Pocket web sites as well. I would like to restore Outlook Mail as my previous opening home page. Thank you for your help.
creator: quig

title: daneryscorreacastro
content: Hola mi pregunta es que pasa cuándo aceptas que Google Dray haga copias en la nube de tu teléfono y sincroniza tus correos?
creator: daneryscorreacastro

title: Microsoft punishes Firefox users by placing account into Pause with green screen
content:
Over a year of not being able to use our home computer in Seattle using Firefox. Microsoft punishes us for using Firefox in Seattle by placing any request or search on Firefox into a full Green Screen labeled PAUSE.

From there left with option to turn computer off. COMCAST Staff say this in not their fault. They receive about $80 month for internet service. My wife and I feel like we are criminals locked up in a high security prison in downtown Seattle, with no way to get out. HELP! HELP! SOS HELP!

EDWARDSEAFELDT@HOTMAIL.COM HP Windows Laptop Core i7
creator: edwardseafeldt

title: new update just dropped, now custom colors dont work on most webpages or in settings
content: fix this glitch firefox used to force custom colors on every single webpage including its own settings now in this update with a background color set to black every page is a blinding white color if this isnt fixed i wont be able to use this browser anymore
creator: shitful

title: Clean out the clutter...
content:
How can I get a clean/uncluttered tab when I initially open a private window?

Subsequent tabs/windows opened are clean/blank - I want that to happen on the first/initial window.
creator: convergencecos

title: What Happened To Firefox Feedback?
content: I tried to hit the Feedback under Firefox Help because this latest update has completely broken the ability to report comments or inappropriate posts on Facebook, to the group admins, but all I keep seeing is something called Mozila.Crowdcity.com! If you're taking our ability to submit simple feedback away, I won't be using Firefox anymore. This has just happened as well since this latest update. I didn't have any trouble submitting feedback prior to this.
creator: tigrisan

title: Firefox connecting at 30% speed available (from ISP)
content:
Hello support

I'm having a bit of difficulty with download speeds in Firefox - I'm on a 1000Mbps connection, but Firefox 78.15.0esr can only download at 300-350Mpbs.

Chrome downloads at 700Mbps and Opera at 900Mbps.

Tested with fast.com and speedtest.net, multiple times/various servers, and Firefox speeds are consistently limited to 350Mbps.

Is there anything I can do to speed up Firefox downloads?

Thank you.
creator: ivan41

title: Amazon return page does not print properly
content:
Have had problem printing Amazon return instructions and QR code for several weeks now.

FF Windows is up-to-date @ 94.0

Fails in Troubleshooting Mode

Fails with all extensions disabled

Screen shots attached
creator: eadamy

title: New York Times live pages won't load
content: Maybe sometime in the past week or so, I began noticing an issue on the New York Times website. I am able to load most articles there normally, but some, marked with a 'live' button for certain types of rapidly updated topics (e.g. election day vote updates or the like) won't load. https://www.nytimes.com/live/2021/11/02/us/election-news?action=click&pgtype=Article&state=default&module=styln-elections-2020®ion=TOP_BANNER&context=election_recirc This is an example of such a page. I click them and just get white space. I normally use a private browser tab for all webpages but it still doesn't load if I use the normal page rather than an in-private window. I would appreciate any help. Let me know if there is any other information I can provide to help people help me. I may need to be walked through some suggestions. I am using version 94 on Linux Mint as of today, and up until today was using whatever the immediately previous version available for Mint was. The described behavior happened on both versions, if that is relevant.
creator: owendombert
